sentences.en: a hot summer’s day
sentences.cn: 一个炎热的夏日

sentences.en: a sunny summer afternoon
sentences.cn: 一个晴朗的夏日午后

sentences.en: a three-week summer vacation
sentences.cn: 为时三周的暑假

sentences.en: After a summer here the poorest sheep and cattle grow strong and fat.
sentences.cn: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

sentences.en: Cool summer dance sounds are drifting from the stereo indoors.
sentences.cn: 清凉的夏日舞曲的声音从室内音响中传了出来。

sentences.en: During their summer holidays they cruised further afield to Normandy and Brittany.
sentences.cn: 暑期他们乘船到更远的诺曼底和布列塔尼游览。

sentences.en: Flowerbeds and tubs are banked with summer bedding plants.
sentences.cn: 花坛和花盆里种满了夏令花草。

sentences.en: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.cn: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.en: Her latest novel is perfect for a lazy summer's afternoon reading.
sentences.cn: 在慵懒的夏日午后阅读她的最新小说最合适不过了。

sentences.en: Her mother wore one of her dark summer prints.
sentences.cn: 她妈妈穿着一件深色印花夏装。

sentences.en: I was simply staggered by the heat of the Argentinian high-summer.
sentences.cn: 阿根廷盛夏的酷热真让我大吃一惊。

sentences.en: I wouldn't have missed this summer in England for anything.
sentences.cn: 我本来说什么也不会错过在英格兰的这个夏季的。

sentences.en: Immediately to our right the old German summer resort was awakening.
sentences.cn: 紧靠我们右面，古老的德国避暑胜地正在苏醒。

sentences.en: Keen skiers are happy to forego a summer holiday to go skiing.
sentences.cn: 滑雪爱好者乐于利用暑期假日去滑雪。

sentences.en: Lots of pubs like to deck themselves out with flowers in summer.
sentences.cn: 夏日里有许多酒吧喜欢用鲜花来装饰店面。

sentences.en: Parliament returns to work today after its summer recess.
sentences.cn: 国会在结束夏季休会后今天开始恢复工作。

sentences.en: Parts of Spain are extremely hot in high summer (= the hottest part of summer ) .
sentences.cn: 盛夏时节，西班牙的部分地区极其炎热。

sentences.en: summer attire
sentences.cn: 夏装

sentences.en: Summer clothes are invariably less kind to fuller figures.
sentences.cn: 体形较丰满的人穿夏装总是不那么好看。

sentences.en: Thatch is naturally warm in winter and cool in summer.
sentences.cn: 茅草料天生冬暖夏凉。

sentences.en: The children play on the beach during the summer.
sentences.cn: 夏天孩子们在海滩上玩耍。

sentences.en: the long hot summer of 1976
sentences.cn: 1976 年炎热漫长的夏天

sentences.en: There is an olde worlde look about the clothes for summer.
sentences.cn: 这些夏装看上去有复古风范。

sentences.en: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.cn: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.en: We'd eat during the hot summer evenings on the front porch.
sentences.cn: 在炎热的夏夜，我们会在屋前走廊上吃晚饭。
